info.name: My Dark Theme - Bing PRO
info.description:
A new version of the Bing style. Built from scratch, optimized and expanded.


Nowe wersja stylu Bing. Stworzone od nowa i od zera, zoptymalizowane i rozbudowana.
info.additionalInfo:

The rewards website is now properly operated.
